title: Basic Plan
description: The Basic Plan is perfect for individuals and small teams looking to access core features without breaking the bank. For just $10 per month or $50 annually, users can enjoy access to essential tools and services.
excerpt: Ideal for small teams, offering core features and tools at an affordable price.

monthly: Access to all core platform features
annual: Access to all core platform features

featureDesc: Access essential tools and features for individuals and small teams at an affordable price.

title: Business Plan
description: The Business Plan is designed for growing businesses and teams that require more advanced features and enhanced support.
excerpt: Advanced tools and support for growing businesses and efficient team collaboration.

monthly: Everything in the Basic Plan included
Storage space up to 100GB per user
annual: Everything in the Basic Plan included
Storage space up to 200GB per user

featureDesc: Advanced features and priority support to help growing teams scale efficiently.

title: Enterprise Plan
description: The Enterprise Plan is the ultimate solution for large teams and organizations seeking custom, scalable solutions.
excerpt: Comprehensive, scalable solutions with premium support for large organizations.
featureDesc: Tailored solutions with 24/7 support and enterprise-grade features for large teams.
